title: British competition regulator objects to Google's ad tech practices

title: Netherlands takes on U.S. export controls, controlling shipments of some ASML machines

title: Director of Disney's Lion King says AI is a 'Wild West,' echoes how animation changed film
content: Artificial intelligence is a "Wild West" with "very few rules" — but it has the potential to democratize the film industry in the long term, says Rob Minkoff.

title: The Fed won't 'push the panic button' and go for a jumbo rate cut, economist says

title: China should focus on fighting deflationary pressure, former central bank governor says
